original: 本文件适用于为具备中文和其他文字图形字符信息化处理及交换功能的技术类产品,包括但不限于以输入法、光学字符识别 (OCR)、编辑 校对、机融翻诺、语音合成、文字转写、乔能写作等为代表的软件产品 , 以及以计算机、通信终端设备、电子书阅读毅、学习机等为代表的便件产品 。
single_agent_translation: This document applies to technical products with the capability to process and exchange information in Chinese and other written graphic characters. This includes, but is not limited to, software products such as input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text transcription, and intelligent writing. It also includes hardware products such as computers, communication terminal devices, e-book readers, and learning machines.
single_agent_improved_translation: This document applies to technical products with the capability to process and exchange information in Chinese and other written graphic characters, including, but not limited to, software products such as input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation and conversion, speech synthesis, text transcription, and intelligent writing, as well as hardware products such as computers, communication terminal devices, e-book readers, and learning machines.

single_agent_translation:
Translate the following from Chinese to English:

Implement level 1 support for the single-byte encoding section, double-byte encoding section, and four-byte encoding section of this document for CJK Unified Ideographs (i.e., 0x82358F33 to 0x82359636) and CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A (i.e., 0x8139EE39 to 0x82358738).

original: 如果只操作四个阶段( 预处理, 编译, 汇编, 连接)中的一部分, 可以使用 ` -x' 选项 (或文件名后 Ah) 告诉 geo 从哪里开始,用 `~-c' ，`-s' ,或 `-E' 选项告诉 geo 到哪里结束.注意,某些选项组合 (例如 ，`-x cpp-output -E') {i gee MEF =c 编译或汇编源文件, ETER. ERA ATI 缺省情况下， GCC 通过用 ` .o' 蔡换源文件名后级 ` .ec 标文件名. 可以使用-o 选项选择其他名字.GCC忽略 -ec 选项后面任何无法识别的输入文伯 -S F 何事情.
single_agent_translation: If you only want to perform a portion of the four stages (preprocessing, compiling, assembling, linking), you can use the `-x` option (or append Ah to the filename) to tell the compiler where to start, and use the `-c`, `-s`, or `-E` options to tell it where to stop. Note that certain combinations of options (such as `-x cpp-output -E`) will not compile or assemble the source file. By default, GCC replaces the source filename extension with `.o` for object files. You can use the `-o` option to choose a different name. GCC ignores any unrecognized input following the `-ec` option and does nothing.
single_agent_improved_translation: If you only want to perform a portion of the four stages (preprocessing, compiling, assembling, linking), you can use the -x option (or append Ah to the filename) to specify where to start, and use the -c, -s, or -E options to specify where to stop. Note that certain combinations of options (such as -x cpp-output -E) will not compile or assemble the source file. By default, GCC replaces the source filename extension with .o for object files. You can use the -o option to choose a different name.

original: 编译后即停止, 不进行汇编件.
single_agent_translation: "Stop after compilation, do not proceed to assembly."
single_agent_improved_translation: "Stop after compilation, do not proceed to the assembly stage."

original: 在编译过程的不同阶段间使用管道而非临时文件进行工作, 因为那些系统的汇编器不能从管道读取数据，GNU 的汇编器没有这个问题，汇编器能够接受的 C "方言 ": 支持符合 ANSI 标准的 C 程序.
single_agent_translation: Use pipelines instead of temporary files between different stages of the compilation process, as the assemblers on those systems cannot read data from pipelines. The GNU assembler does not have this issue. The assembler can accept C "dialects" that support ANSI standard-compliant C programs.
single_agent_improved_translation: Use pipelines instead of temporary files between different stages of the compilation process, as the assemblers on those systems cannot read data from pipelines, but the GNU assembler does not have this problem. The assembler can accept C dialects that comply with ANSI standard C programs.

original: 新冠肺炎或将导致毒品市场进一步扩张新冠肺炎的大流行可能会导致更多农民增加或从事非法作物种植，或是因为国家主管机关的控制能力降低，或是因为在经济危机之下可能有更多人不得不铤而走险，从事非法活动。

single_agent_improved_translation: The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to further expansion of the drug market, as it could result in more farmers increasing or engaging in the cultivation of illegal crops, either due to the reduced control capacity of national authorities or because more people might be forced to take risks and engage in illegal activities amidst the economic crisis.

single_agent_improved_translation: When in standby mode, activate the voice assistant (requires the device to support voice functionality and have the quick wake-up setting enabled).

original: 1 请勿以任何理由拆开.维修或改装耳机, 否则可能会导致起火甚至彻底损坏本产品;
single_agent_translation: 1. Please do not disassemble, repair, or modify the headphones for any reason, as this may cause a fire or even completely damage the product.
single_agent_improved_translation: 1. Please do not disassemble, repair, or modify the headphones for any reason, as this may cause a fire or even completely damage the product.

original: 4 请勿在雷暴天气下使用该设备, 雷暴可导致设备工作异常, 并增加触电的危险;
single_agent_translation: 4. Please do not use this device during thunderstorms, as thunderstorms can cause the device to malfunction and increase the risk of electric shock.
single_agent_improved_translation: 4. Please do not use this device during thunderstorms, as thunderstorms can cause the device to malfunction and increase the risk of electric shock.

original: 6 请勿将本产品与液体接触。

single_agent_improved_translation: 6. Please do not expose this product to liquids.

original: 3 长时间连续使用耳机有损听力,请合理控制使用时间及音量 ;
single_agent_translation: Prolonged use of headphones can damage hearing, so please reasonably control the usage time and volume.
single_agent_improved_translation: Prolonged use of headphones can damage hearing, so please control the usage time and volume reasonably.

single_agent_translation: EU Summit Debates Refugee Policy, EU Official: Reception Process Faces Bottlenecks - China News Service
single_agent_improved_translation: EU Summit Debates Refugee Policy, EU Official: Reception Process Faces Bottlenecks - China News Service

original: 欧盟峰会为难民政策争吵不休，欧盟官员：接收过程每一步都存在瓶颈
single_agent_translation: EU summit embroiled in disputes over refugee policy, EU official: There are bottlenecks at every step of the reception process.
single_agent_improved_translation: EU summit embroiled in disputes over refugee policy, EU official: There are bottlenecks at every step of the reception process.

original: 据报道，欧盟此举是对欧洲日益增长的非法移民问题关注的回应，如今，欧盟的核心问题在于，最终能被遣返的非法移民人数很少。
single_agent_translation: According to reports, this move by the EU is a response to the growing issue of illegal immigration in Europe. Currently, the core issue for the EU is that only a small number of illegal immigrants can ultimately be deported.
single_agent_improved_translation: According to reports, this move by the EU is a response to the growing issue of illegal immigration in Europe. Currently, the core issue for the EU is that the number of illegal immigrants who can ultimately be deported is very small.

original: 冯德莱恩一再表示，欧盟资金不会支付相关费用。
single_agent_translation: Von der Leyen has repeatedly stated that EU funds will not cover the related costs.
single_agent_improved_translation: Von der Leyen has repeatedly stated that EU funds will not cover the related costs.

original: 据欧盟委员会估计，欧盟的申根国家去年收到超92万份庇护申请，比前一年增加近半。
single_agent_translation: According to estimates by the European Commission, the Schengen countries of the European Union received over 920,000 asylum applications last year, an increase of nearly half compared to the previous year.
single_agent_improved_translation: According to estimates by the European Commission, the Schengen countries of the European Union received over 920,000 asylum applications last year, an increase of nearly half compared to the previous year.
